sys_script.name: SLX Promedio Encuesta Proyecto

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_cab0c8341b831050d8d6b887cc4bcb36
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_hocsa_san_encuesta_de_proyecto</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SLX Promedio Encuesta Proyecto</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	//Se crean las variables
    var cont = 0;
    var q1 = parseFloat(current.u_slx_q1_s);
    var q2 = parseFloat(current.u_slx_q2_s);
    var q3 = parseFloat(current.u_slx_q3_s);
    var q4 = parseFloat(current.u_slx_q4_s);
    var q5 = parseFloat(current.u_slx_q5_s);
    var q6 = parseFloat(current.u_slx_q6_s);
    var q7 = parseFloat(current.u_slx_q7_s);
    var q8 = parseFloat(current.u_slx_q8_s);
    var q9 = parseFloat(current.u_slx_q9_s);

    var gr = new GlideRecord('x_hocsa_san_encuesta_de_proyecto');
    gr.addQuery('u_slx_numero', current.u_slx_numero);
    gr.query();
    if (gr.next()) {

        //Se crea un arreglo que contenga todas las variables	
        var questions = [q1, q2, q3, q4, q5, q6, q7, q8, q9];


        //se debe inicializar la variable suma en 0
        var suma = 0;

        //Por cada variable del arreglo se verificara que sea distinto del valor NA=11
        questions.forEach(function(value) {
            if (value != 11) {
                //Por cada valor se ira sumando un contador
                cont++;
                //se van sumando los valores de las variables	
                suma += value;
            }
        });

        if (cont > 0) {
            //se crea una variable promedio y con el metodo math round multiplicado y dividido por 10 el resultado
            //se redondea en 2 decimales
            var prom = (suma / cont);

            //Se setea el campo promedio por la variable promedio
			 gr.u_slx_promedio_obtenido =  prom;
         
			//   gr.u_slx_promedio = parseFloat(prom).toFixed(2);
            gr.update();
            gs.addInfoMessage('promedio ' + prom);
            gs.addInfoMessage('cont ' + cont);


        } else {
            gr.u_slx_promedio_obtenido = 0;
            gr.update();

        }
    }


})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>slx.bs</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-01 18:18:41</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>cab0c8341b831050d8d6b887cc4bcb36</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SLX Promedio Encuesta Proyecto</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="san" source="x_hocsa_san">b3538a711ba598108802dac2cd4bcb8e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="san">b3538a711ba598108802dac2cd4bcb8e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_cab0c8341b831050d8d6b887cc4bcb36</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>slx.bs</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-01 18:18:41</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=cab0c8341b831050d8d6b887cc4bcb36"/></record_update>
